channel.title: Blog on Najwa Laabid
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Najwa Laabid

item.title: Variational Autoencoders for Single-Cell Genomics
item.description: Introduction When participating in the Neurips 2021 single-cell analysis challenge, my team and I proposed a solution based on variational autoencoders (VAEs) for the modality prediction task. Later on, when trying to improve the model to include batch effect correction, I realized I needed to delve deeper into the mathematics behind VAEs and their modeling philosophy to be able to manipulate them fully. This lead to a reading spree on everything variational autoencoders, from the original paper, to subsequent published tutorials, and a number of online blogs (Keng’s, and Jaan’s being my favorite).
